data.title: Leopold Von Ranke and the Shaping of the Historical Discipline — Cincinnati & Hamilton County Public Library
data.meta_description: Leopold Von Ranke and the Shaping of the Historical Discipline — Ranke (1795-1886) championed objective writing based on source material and established the study of history as a major university discipline. These essays, presented in October 1986 at a conference held to mark the centennial of his death, place the German historian in the context of the developing discipline and introduce important issues and problems in European historiography. Annotation(c) 2003 Book News, Inc., Portland, OR (booknews.com)
